features.featureTitle: Update the useLabels hook to expose createLabel, updateLabel (except for 'All'), and deleteLabel (except for 'All') operations. When a label is deleted, all notes that reference that label must be safely reassigned to 'All' (or have the label reference removed) without breaking any existing note data.

Expose label management UI through the existing LabelManager modal component (frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManager.tsx) so users can add new labels, rename existing labels (except 'All'), and delete existing labels (except 'All'). Do not change the Notes page layout, label filter bar appearance, or any other UI outside of what is strictly required for this management interface.
